Santa_Clara.Arts Council Silicon Valley:
The Arts Council Silicon Valley is the official Santa Clara County, United States arts council.
Established in 1982, Arts Council Silicon Valley (ACSV) is a private, nonprofit arts organization dedicated to improving the quality of life for Santa Clara County residents by creating and fostering arts and culture throughout the region.
As a grant-making agency, the ACSV provides funding and fundraising support services to more than 140 local arts organizations and individual artists.
